                     <div class="speaker">JESSICA</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll tell my husband, Launcelot, what you say: here he comes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LORENZO</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall grow jealous of you shortly, Launcelot, if</div>
                     <div class="line">you thus get my wife into corners.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JESSICA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, you need not fear us, Lorenzo: Launcelot and I</div>
                     <div class="line">are out. He tells me flatly, there is no mercy for</div>
                     <div class="line">me in heaven, because I am a Jew's daughter: and he</div>
                     <div class="line">says, you are no good member of the commonwealth,</div>
                     <div class="line">for in converting Jews to Christians, you raise the</div>
                     <div class="line">price of pork.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LORENZO</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall answer that better to the commonwealth than</div>
                     <div class="line">you can the getting up of the negro's belly: the</div>
                     <div class="line">Moor is with child by you, Launcelot.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCELOT</div>
                     <div class="line">It is much that the Moor should be more than reason:</div>
                     <div class="line">but if she be less than an honest woman, she is</div>
                     <div class="line">indeed more than I took her for.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LORENZO</div>
                     <div class="line">How every fool can play upon the word! I think the</div>
                     <div class="line">best grace of wit will shortly turn into silence,</div>
                     <div class="line">and discourse grow commendable in none only but</div>
                     <div class="line">parrots. Go in, sirrah; bid them prepare for dinner.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCELOT</div>
                     <div class="line">That is done, sir; they have all stomachs.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LORENZO</div>
                     <div class="line">Goodly Lord, what a wit-snapper are you! then bid</div>
                     <div class="line">them prepare dinner.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCELOT</div>
                     <div class="line">That is done too, sir; only 'cover' is the word.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LORENZO</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you cover then, sir?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCELOT</div>
                     <div class="line">Not so, sir, neither; I know my duty.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LORENZO</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet more quarrelling with occasion! Wilt thou show</div>
                     <div class="line">the whole wealth of thy wit in an instant? I pray</div>
                     <div class="line">tree, understand a plain man in his plain meaning:</div>
                     <div class="line">go to thy fellows; bid them cover the table, serve</div>
                     <div class="line">in the meat, and we will come in to dinner.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LAUNCELOT</div>
                     <div class="line">For the table, sir, it shall be served in; for the</div>
                     <div class="line">meat, sir, it shall be covered; for your coming in</div>
                     <div class="line">to dinner, sir, why, let it be as humours and</div>
                     <div class="line">conceits shall govern.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LORENZO</div>
                     <div class="line">O dear discretion, how his words are suited!</div>
                     <div class="line">The fool hath planted in his memory</div>
                     <div class="line">An army of good words; and I do know</div>
                     <div class="line">A many fools, that stand in better place,</div>
                     <div class="line">Garnish'd like him, that for a tricksy word</div>
                     <div class="line">Defy the matter. How cheerest thou, Jessica?</div>
                     <div class="line">And now, good sweet, say thy opinion,</div>
                     <div class="line">How dost thou like the Lord Bassanio's wife?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JESSICA</div>
                     <div class="line">Past all expressing. It is very meet</div>
                     <div class="line">The Lord Bassanio live an upright life;</div>
                     <div class="line">For, having such a blessing in his lady,</div>
                     <div class="line">He finds the joys of heaven here on earth;</div>
                     <div class="line">And if on earth he do not mean it, then</div>
                     <div class="line">In reason he should never come to heaven</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, if two gods should play some heavenly match</div>
                     <div class="line">And on the wager lay two earthly women,</div>
                     <div class="line">And Portia one, there must be something else</div>
                     <div class="line">Pawn'd with the other, for the poor rude world</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath not her fellow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LORENZO</div>
                     <div class="line">Even such a husband</div>
                     <div class="line">Hast thou of me as she is for a wife.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JESSICA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, but ask my opinion too of that.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LORENZO</div>
                     <div class="line">I will anon: first, let us go to dinner.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JESSICA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, let me praise you while I have a stomach.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LORENZO</div>
                     <div class="line">No, pray thee, let it serve for table-talk;</div>
                     <div class="line">' Then, howso'er thou speak'st, 'mong other things</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall digest it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JESSICA</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, I'll set you forth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 4. ACT IV</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  Venice. A court of justice.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  The same. A street.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Venice. A court of justice.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter the DUKE, the Magnificoes, ANTONIO, BASSANIO,
GRATIANO, SALERIO, and others</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">What, is Antonio here?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ready, so please your grace.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">I am sorry for thee: thou art come to answer</div>
                     <div class="line">A stony adversary, an inhuman wretch</div>
                     <div class="line">uncapable of pity, void and empty</div>
                     <div class="line">From any dram of mercy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I have heard</div>
                     <div class="line">Your grace hath ta'en great pains to qualify</div>
                     <div class="line">His rigorous course; but since he stands obdurate</div>
                     <div class="line">And that no lawful means can carry me</div>
                     <div class="line">Out of his envy's reach, I do oppose</div>
                     <div class="line">My patience to his fury, and am arm'd</div>
                     <div class="line">To suffer, with a quietness of spirit,</div>
                     <div class="line">The very tyranny and rage of his.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Go one, and call the Jew into the court.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SALERIO</div>
                     <div class="line">He is ready at the door: he comes, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter SHYLOCK</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Make room, and let him stand before our face.</div>
                     <div class="line">Shylock, the world thinks, and I think so too,</div>
                     <div class="line">That thou but lead'st this fashion of thy malice</div>
                     <div class="line">To the last hour of act; and then 'tis thought</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou'lt show thy mercy and remorse more strange</div>
                     <div class="line">Than is thy strange apparent cruelty;</div>
                     <div class="line">And where thou now exact'st the penalty,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which is a pound of this poor merchant's flesh,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou wilt not only loose the forfeiture,</div>
                     <div class="line">But, touch'd with human gentleness and love,</div>
                     <div class="line">Forgive a moiety of the principal;</div>
                     <div class="line">Glancing an eye of pity on his losses,</div>
                     <div class="line">That have of late so huddled on his back,</div>
                     <div class="line">Enow to press a royal merchant down</div>
                     <div class="line">And pluck commiseration of his state</div>
                     <div class="line">From brassy bosoms and rough hearts of flint,</div>
                     <div class="line">From stubborn Turks and Tartars, never train'd</div>
                     <div class="line">To offices of tender courtesy.</div>
                     <div class="line">We all expect a gentle answer, Jew.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">I have possess'd your grace of what I purpose;</div>
                     <div class="line">And by our holy Sabbath have I sworn</div>
                     <div class="line">To have the due and forfeit of my bond:</div>
                     <div class="line">If you deny it, let the danger light</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon your charter and your city's freedom.</div>
                     <div class="line">You'll ask me, why I rather choose to have</div>
                     <div class="line">A weight of carrion flesh than to receive</div>
                     <div class="line">Three thousand ducats: I'll not answer that:</div>
                     <div class="line">But, say, it is my humour: is it answer'd?</div>
                     <div class="line">What if my house be troubled with a rat</div>
                     <div class="line">And I be pleased to give ten thousand ducats</div>
                     <div class="line">To have it baned? What, are you answer'd yet?</div>
                     <div class="line">Some men there are love not a gaping pig;</div>
                     <div class="line">Some, that are mad if they behold a cat;</div>
                     <div class="line">And others, when the bagpipe sings i' the nose,</div>
                     <div class="line">Cannot contain their urine: for affection,</div>
                     <div class="line">Mistress of passion, sways it to the mood</div>
                     <div class="line">Of what it likes or loathes. Now, for your answer:</div>
                     <div class="line">As there is no firm reason to be render'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">Why he cannot abide a gaping pig;</div>
                     <div class="line">Why he, a harmless necessary cat;</div>
                     <div class="line">Why he, a woollen bagpipe; but of force</div>
                     <div class="line">Must yield to such inevitable shame</div>
                     <div class="line">As to offend, himself being offended;</div>
                     <div class="line">So can I give no reason, nor I will not,</div>
                     <div class="line">More than a lodged hate and a certain loathing</div>
                     <div class="line">I bear Antonio, that I follow thus</div>
                     <div class="line">A losing suit against him. Are you answer'd?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">This is no answer, thou unfeeling man,</div>
                     <div class="line">To excuse the current of thy cruelty.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">I am not bound to please thee with my answers.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Do all men kill the things they do not love?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">Hates any man the thing he would not kill?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Every offence is not a hate at first.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">What, wouldst thou have a serpent sting thee twice?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, think you question with the Jew:</div>
                     <div class="line">You may as well go stand upon the beach</div>
                     <div class="line">And bid the main flood bate his usual height;</div>
                     <div class="line">You may as well use question with the wolf</div>
                     <div class="line">Why he hath made the ewe bleat for the lamb;</div>
                     <div class="line">You may as well forbid the mountain pines</div>
                     <div class="line">To wag their high tops and to make no noise,</div>
                     <div class="line">When they are fretten with the gusts of heaven;</div>
                     <div class="line">You may as well do anything most hard,</div>
                     <div class="line">As seek to soften that--than which what's harder?--</div>
                     <div class="line">His Jewish heart: therefore, I do beseech you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Make no more offers, use no farther means,</div>
                     <div class="line">But with all brief and plain conveniency</div>
                     <div class="line">Let me have judgment and the Jew his will.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">For thy three thousand ducats here is six.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">What judgment shall I dread, doing</div>
                     <div class="line">Were in six parts and every part a ducat,</div>
                     <div class="line">I would not draw them; I would have my bond.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">How shalt thou hope for mercy, rendering none?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">What judgment shall I dread, doing no wrong?</div>
                     <div class="line">You have among you many a purchased slave,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which, like your asses and your dogs and mules,</div>
                     <div class="line">You use in abject and in slavish parts,</div>
                     <div class="line">Because you bought them: shall I say to you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let them be free, marry them to your heirs?</div>
                     <div class="line">Why sweat they under burthens? let their beds</div>
                     <div class="line">Be made as soft as yours and let their palates</div>
                     <div class="line">Be season'd with such viands? You will answer</div>
                     <div class="line">'The slaves are ours:' so do I answer you:</div>
                     <div class="line">The pound of flesh, which I demand of him,</div>
                     <div class="line">Is dearly bought; 'tis mine and I will have it.</div>
                     <div class="line">If you deny me, fie upon your law!</div>
                     <div class="line">There is no force in the decrees of Venice.</div>
                     <div class="line">I stand for judgment: answer; shall I have it?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon my power I may dismiss this court,</div>
                     <div class="line">Unless Bellario, a learned doctor,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whom I have sent for to determine this,</div>
                     <div class="line">Come here to-day.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SALERIO</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord, here stays without</div>
                     <div class="line">A messenger with letters from the doctor,</div>
                     <div class="line">New come from Padua.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Bring us the letter; call the messenger.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Good cheer, Antonio! What, man, courage yet!</div>
                     <div class="line">The Jew shall have my flesh, blood, bones and all,</div>
                     <div class="line">Ere thou shalt lose for me one drop of blood.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am a tainted wether of the flock,</div>
                     <div class="line">Meetest for death: the weakest kind of fruit</div>
                     <div class="line">Drops earliest to the ground; and so let me</div>
                     <div class="line">You cannot better be employ'd, Bassanio,</div>
                     <div class="line">Than to live still and write mine epitaph.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter NERISSA, dressed like a lawyer's clerk</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Came you from Padua, from Bellario?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NERISSA</div>
                     <div class="line">From both, my lord. Bellario greets your grace.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Presenting a letter</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why dost thou whet thy knife so earnestly?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">To cut the forfeiture from that bankrupt there.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Not on thy sole, but on thy soul, harsh Jew,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou makest thy knife keen; but no metal can,</div>
                     <div class="line">No, not the hangman's axe, bear half the keenness</div>
                     <div class="line">Of thy sharp envy. Can no prayers pierce thee?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">No, none that thou hast wit enough to make.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, be thou damn'd, inexecrable dog!</div>
                     <div class="line">And for thy life let justice be accused.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou almost makest me waver in my faith</div>
                     <div class="line">To hold opinion with Pythagoras,</div>
                     <div class="line">That souls of animals infuse themselves</div>
                     <div class="line">Into the trunks of men: thy currish spirit</div>
                     <div class="line">Govern'd a wolf, who, hang'd for human slaughter,</div>
                     <div class="line">Even from the gallows did his fell soul fleet,</div>
                     <div class="line">And, whilst thou lay'st in thy unhallow'd dam,</div>
                     <div class="line">Infused itself in thee; for thy desires</div>
                     <div class="line">Are wolvish, bloody, starved and ravenous.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">Till thou canst rail the seal from off my bond,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou but offend'st thy lungs to speak so loud:</div>
                     <div class="line">Repair thy wit, good youth, or it will fall</div>
                     <div class="line">To cureless ruin. I stand here for law.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">This letter from Bellario doth commend</div>
                     <div class="line">A young and learned doctor to our court.</div>
                     <div class="line">Where is he?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NERISSA</div>
                     <div class="line">He attendeth here hard by,</div>
                     <div class="line">To know your answer, whether you'll admit him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">With all my heart. Some three or four of you</div>
                     <div class="line">Go give him courteous conduct to this place.</div>
                     <div class="line">Meantime the court shall hear Bellario's letter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Clerk</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Reads</span>
                     </div>
                     <div class="line">Your grace shall understand that at the receipt of</div>
                     <div class="line">your letter I am very sick: but in the instant that</div>
                     <div class="line">your messenger came, in loving visitation was with</div>
                     <div class="line">me a young doctor of Rome; his name is Balthasar. I</div>
                     <div class="line">acquainted him with the cause in controversy between</div>
                     <div class="line">the Jew and Antonio the merchant: we turned o'er</div>
                     <div class="line">many books together: he is furnished with my</div>
                     <div class="line">opinion; which, bettered with his own learning, the</div>
                     <div class="line">greatness whereof I cannot enough commend, comes</div>
                     <div class="line">with him, at my importunity, to fill up your grace's</div>
                     <div class="line">request in my stead. I beseech you, let his lack of</div>
                     <div class="line">years be no impediment to let him lack a reverend</div>
                     <div class="line">estimation; for I never knew so young a body with so</div>
                     <div class="line">old a head. I leave him to your gracious</div>
                     <div class="line">acceptance, whose trial shall better publish his</div>
                     <div class="line">commendation.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">You hear the learn'd Bellario, what he writes:</div>
                     <div class="line">And here, I take it, is the doctor come.</div>
                     <p>Enter PORTIA, dressed like a doctor of laws</p>
                     <div class="line">Give me your hand. Come you from old Bellario?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I did, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">You are welcome: take your place.</div>
                     <div class="line">Are you acquainted with the difference</div>
                     <div class="line">That holds this present question in the court?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I am informed thoroughly of the cause.</div>
                     <div class="line">Which is the merchant here, and which the Jew?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Antonio and old Shylock, both stand forth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Is your name Shylock?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">Shylock is my name.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Of a strange nature is the suit you follow;</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet in such rule that the Venetian law</div>
                     <div class="line">Cannot impugn you as you do proceed.</div>
                     <div class="line">You stand within his danger, do you not?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, so he says.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you confess the bond?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I do.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Then must the Jew be merciful.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">On what compulsion must I? tell me that.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">The quality of mercy is not strain'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">It droppeth as the gentle rain from heaven</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon the place beneath: it is twice blest;</div>
                     <div class="line">It blesseth him that gives and him that takes:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis mightiest in the mightiest: it becomes</div>
                     <div class="line">The throned monarch better than his crown;</div>
                     <div class="line">His sceptre shows the force of temporal power,</div>
                     <div class="line">The attribute to awe and majesty,</div>
                     <div class="line">Wherein doth sit the dread and fear of kings;</div>
                     <div class="line">But mercy is above this sceptred sway;</div>
                     <div class="line">It is enthroned in the hearts of kings,</div>
                     <div class="line">It is an attribute to God himself;</div>
                     <div class="line">And earthly power doth then show likest God's</div>
                     <div class="line">When mercy seasons justice. Therefore, Jew,</div>
                     <div class="line">Though justice be thy plea, consider this,</div>
                     <div class="line">That, in the course of justice, none of us</div>
                     <div class="line">Should see salvation: we do pray for mercy;</div>
                     <div class="line">And that same prayer doth teach us all to render</div>
                     <div class="line">The deeds of mercy. I have spoke thus much</div>
                     <div class="line">To mitigate the justice of thy plea;</div>
                     <div class="line">Which if thou follow, this strict court of Venice</div>
                     <div class="line">Must needs give sentence 'gainst the merchant there.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">My deeds upon my head! I crave the law,</div>
                     <div class="line">The penalty and forfeit of my bond.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Is he not able to discharge the money?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes, here I tender it for him in the court;</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea, twice the sum: if that will not suffice,</div>
                     <div class="line">I will be bound to pay it ten times o'er,</div>
                     <div class="line">On forfeit of my hands, my head, my heart:</div>
                     <div class="line">If this will not suffice, it must appear</div>
                     <div class="line">That malice bears down truth. And I beseech you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Wrest once the law to your authority:</div>
                     <div class="line">To do a great right, do a little wrong,</div>
                     <div class="line">And curb this cruel devil of his will.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">It must not be; there is no power in Venice</div>
                     <div class="line">Can alter a decree established:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twill be recorded for a precedent,</div>
                     <div class="line">And many an error by the same example</div>
                     <div class="line">Will rush into the state: it cannot be.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">A Daniel come to judgment! yea, a Daniel!</div>
                     <div class="line">O wise young judge, how I do honour thee!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, let me look upon the bond.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">Here 'tis, most reverend doctor, here it is.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Shylock, there's thrice thy money offer'd thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">An oath, an oath, I have an oath in heaven:</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall I lay perjury upon my soul?</div>
                     <div class="line">No, not for Venice.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, this bond is forfeit;</div>
                     <div class="line">And lawfully by this the Jew may claim</div>
                     <div class="line">A pound of flesh, to be by him cut off</div>
                     <div class="line">Nearest the merchant's heart. Be merciful:</div>
                     <div class="line">Take thrice thy money; bid me tear the bond.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">When it is paid according to the tenor.</div>
                     <div class="line">It doth appear you are a worthy judge;</div>
                     <div class="line">You know the law, your exposition</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath been most sound: I charge you by the law,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whereof you are a well-deserving pillar,</div>
                     <div class="line">Proceed to judgment: by my soul I swear</div>
                     <div class="line">There is no power in the tongue of man</div>
                     <div class="line">To alter me: I stay here on my bond.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Most heartily I do beseech the court</div>
                     <div class="line">To give the judgment.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why then, thus it is:</div>
                     <div class="line">You must prepare your bosom for his knife.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">O noble judge! O excellent young man!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">For the intent and purpose of the law</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath full relation to the penalty,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which here appeareth due upon the bond.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis very true: O wise and upright judge!</div>
                     <div class="line">How much more elder art thou than thy looks!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore lay bare your bosom.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, his breast:</div>
                     <div class="line">So says the bond: doth it not, noble judge?</div>
                     <div class="line">'Nearest his heart:' those are the very words.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">It is so. Are there balance here to weigh</div>
                     <div class="line">The flesh?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">I have them ready.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Have by some surgeon, Shylock, on your charge,</div>
                     <div class="line">To stop his wounds, lest he do bleed to death.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">Is it so nominated in the bond?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">It is not so express'd: but what of that?</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twere good you do so much for charity.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">I cannot find it; 'tis not in the bond.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">You, merchant, have you any thing to say?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">But little: I am arm'd and well prepared.</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me your hand, Bassanio: fare you well!</div>
                     <div class="line">Grieve not that I am fallen to this for you;</div>
                     <div class="line">For herein Fortune shows herself more kind</div>
                     <div class="line">Than is her custom: it is still her use</div>
                     <div class="line">To let the wretched man outlive his wealth,</div>
                     <div class="line">To view with hollow eye and wrinkled brow</div>
                     <div class="line">An age of poverty; from which lingering penance</div>
                     <div class="line">Of such misery doth she cut me off.</div>
                     <div class="line">Commend me to your honourable wife:</div>
                     <div class="line">Tell her the process of Antonio's end;</div>
                     <div class="line">Say how I loved you, speak me fair in death;</div>
                     <div class="line">And, when the tale is told, bid her be judge</div>
                     <div class="line">Whether Bassanio had not once a love.</div>
                     <div class="line">Repent but you that you shall lose your friend,</div>
                     <div class="line">And he repents not that he pays your debt;</div>
                     <div class="line">For if the Jew do cut but deep enough,</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll pay it presently with all my heart.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Antonio, I am married to a wife</div>
                     <div class="line">Which is as dear to me as life itself;</div>
                     <div class="line">But life itself, my wife, and all the world,</div>
                     <div class="line">Are not with me esteem'd above thy life:</div>
                     <div class="line">I would lose all, ay, sacrifice them all</div>
                     <div class="line">Here to this devil, to deliver you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Your wife would give you little thanks for that,</div>
                     <div class="line">If she were by, to hear you make the offer.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">I have a wife, whom, I protest, I love:</div>
                     <div class="line">I would she were in heaven, so she could</div>
                     <div class="line">Entreat some power to change this currish Jew.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NERISSA</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis well you offer it behind her back;</div>
                     <div class="line">The wish would make else an unquiet house.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">These be the Christian husbands. I have a daughter;</div>
                     <div class="line">Would any of the stock of Barrabas</div>
                     <div class="line">Had been her husband rather than a Christian!</div>
                     <p>Aside</p>
                     <div class="line">We trifle time: I pray thee, pursue sentence.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">A pound of that same merchant's flesh is thine:</div>
                     <div class="line">The court awards it, and the law doth give it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">Most rightful judge!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">And you must cut this flesh from off his breast:</div>
                     <div class="line">The law allows it, and the court awards it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">Most learned judge! A sentence! Come, prepare!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Tarry a little; there is something else.</div>
                     <div class="line">This bond doth give thee here no jot of blood;</div>
                     <div class="line">The words expressly are 'a pound of flesh:'</div>
                     <div class="line">Take then thy bond, take thou thy pound of flesh;</div>
                     <div class="line">But, in the cutting it, if thou dost shed</div>
                     <div class="line">One drop of Christian blood, thy lands and goods</div>
                     <div class="line">Are, by the laws of Venice, confiscate</div>
                     <div class="line">Unto the state of Venice.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">O upright judge! Mark, Jew: O learned judge!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">Is that the law?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Thyself shalt see the act:</div>
                     <div class="line">For, as thou urgest justice, be assured</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou shalt have justice, more than thou desirest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">O learned judge! Mark, Jew: a learned judge!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">I take this offer, then; pay the bond thrice</div>
                     <div class="line">And let the Christian go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is the money.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Soft!</div>
                     <div class="line">The Jew shall have all justice; soft! no haste:</div>
                     <div class="line">He shall have nothing but the penalty.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">O Jew! an upright judge, a learned judge!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore prepare thee to cut off the flesh.</div>
                     <div class="line">Shed thou no blood, nor cut thou less nor more</div>
                     <div class="line">But just a pound of flesh: if thou cut'st more</div>
                     <div class="line">Or less than a just pound, be it but so much</div>
                     <div class="line">As makes it light or heavy in the substance,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or the division of the twentieth part</div>
                     <div class="line">Of one poor scruple, nay, if the scale do turn</div>
                     <div class="line">But in the estimation of a hair,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou diest and all thy goods are confiscate.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">A second Daniel, a Daniel, Jew!</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, infidel, I have you on the hip.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why doth the Jew pause? take thy forfeiture.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me my principal, and let me go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I have it ready for thee; here it is.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">He hath refused it in the open court:</div>
                     <div class="line">He shall have merely justice and his bond.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">A Daniel, still say I, a second Daniel!</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank thee, Jew, for teaching me that word.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall I not have barely my principal?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou shalt have nothing but the forfeiture,</div>
                     <div class="line">To be so taken at thy peril, Jew.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, then the devil give him good of it!</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll stay no longer question.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Tarry, Jew:</div>
                     <div class="line">The law hath yet another hold on you.</div>
                     <div class="line">It is enacted in the laws of Venice,</div>
                     <div class="line">If it be proved against an alien</div>
                     <div class="line">That by direct or indirect attempts</div>
                     <div class="line">He seek the life of any citizen,</div>
                     <div class="line">The party 'gainst the which he doth contrive</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall seize one half his goods; the other half</div>
                     <div class="line">Comes to the privy coffer of the state;</div>
                     <div class="line">And the offender's life lies in the mercy</div>
                     <div class="line">Of the duke only, 'gainst all other voice.</div>
                     <div class="line">In which predicament, I say, thou stand'st;</div>
                     <div class="line">For it appears, by manifest proceeding,</div>
                     <div class="line">That indirectly and directly too</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou hast contrived against the very life</div>
                     <div class="line">Of the defendant; and thou hast incurr'd</div>
                     <div class="line">The danger formerly by me rehearsed.</div>
                     <div class="line">Down therefore and beg mercy of the duke.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Beg that thou mayst have leave to hang thyself:</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet, thy wealth being forfeit to the state,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou hast not left the value of a cord;</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore thou must be hang'd at the state's charge.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">That thou shalt see the difference of our spirits,</div>
                     <div class="line">I pardon thee thy life before thou ask it:</div>
                     <div class="line">For half thy wealth, it is Antonio's;</div>
                     <div class="line">The other half comes to the general state,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which humbleness may drive unto a fine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, for the state, not for Antonio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, take my life and all; pardon not that:</div>
                     <div class="line">You take my house when you do take the prop</div>
                     <div class="line">That doth sustain my house; you take my life</div>
                     <div class="line">When you do take the means whereby I live.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">What mercy can you render him, Antonio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">A halter gratis; nothing else, for God's sake.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">So please my lord the duke and all the court</div>
                     <div class="line">To quit the fine for one half of his goods,</div>
                     <div class="line">I am content; so he will let me have</div>
                     <div class="line">The other half in use, to render it,</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon his death, unto the gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">That lately stole his daughter:</div>
                     <div class="line">Two things provided more, that, for this favour,</div>
                     <div class="line">He presently become a Christian;</div>
                     <div class="line">The other, that he do record a gift,</div>
                     <div class="line">Here in the court, of all he dies possess'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">Unto his son Lorenzo and his daughter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">He shall do this, or else I do recant</div>
                     <div class="line">The pardon that I late pronounced here.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Art thou contented, Jew? what dost thou say?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">I am content.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Clerk, draw a deed of gift.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SHYLOCK</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, give me leave to go from hence;</div>
                     <div class="line">I am not well: send the deed after me,</div>
                     <div class="line">And I will sign it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Get thee gone, but do it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">In christening shalt thou have two god-fathers:</div>
                     <div class="line">Had I been judge, thou shouldst have had ten more,</div>
                     <div class="line">To bring thee to the gallows, not the font.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit SHYLOCK</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, I entreat you home with me to dinner.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I humbly do desire your grace of pardon:</div>
                     <div class="line">I must away this night toward Padua,</div>
                     <div class="line">And it is meet I presently set forth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">I am sorry that your leisure serves you not.</div>
                     <div class="line">Antonio, gratify this gentleman,</div>
                     <div class="line">For, in my mind, you are much bound to him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt Duke and his train</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Most worthy gentleman, I and my friend</div>
                     <div class="line">Have by your wisdom been this day acquitted</div>
                     <div class="line">Of grievous penalties; in lieu whereof,</div>
                     <div class="line">Three thousand ducats, due unto the Jew,</div>
                     <div class="line">We freely cope your courteous pains withal.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And stand indebted, over and above,</div>
                     <div class="line">In love and service to you evermore.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">He is well paid that is well satisfied;</div>
                     <div class="line">And I, delivering you, am satisfied</div>
                     <div class="line">And therein do account myself well paid:</div>
                     <div class="line">My mind was never yet more mercenary.</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, know me when we meet again:</div>
                     <div class="line">I wish you well, and so I take my leave.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Dear sir, of force I must attempt you further:</div>
                     <div class="line">Take some remembrance of us, as a tribute,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not as a fee: grant me two things, I pray you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not to deny me, and to pardon me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">You press me far, and therefore I will yield.</div>
                     <p>To ANTONIO</p>
                     <div class="line">Give me your gloves, I'll wear them for your sake;</div>
                     <p>To BASSANIO</p>
                     <div class="line">And, for your love, I'll take this ring from you:</div>
                     <div class="line">Do not draw back your hand; I'll take no more;</div>
                     <div class="line">And you in love shall not deny me this.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">This ring, good sir, alas, it is a trifle!</div>
                     <div class="line">I will not shame myself to give you this.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I will have nothing else but only this;</div>
                     <div class="line">And now methinks I have a mind to it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">There's more depends on this than on the value.</div>
                     <div class="line">The dearest ring in Venice will I give you,</div>
                     <div class="line">And find it out by proclamation:</div>
                     <div class="line">Only for this, I pray you, pardon me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I see, sir, you are liberal in offers</div>
                     <div class="line">You taught me first to beg; and now methinks</div>
                     <div class="line">You teach me how a beggar should be answer'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Good sir, this ring was given me by my wife;</div>
                     <div class="line">And when she put it on, she made me vow</div>
                     <div class="line">That I should neither sell nor give nor lose it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">That 'scuse serves many men to save their gifts.</div>
                     <div class="line">An if your wife be not a mad-woman,</div>
                     <div class="line">And know how well I have deserved the ring,</div>
                     <div class="line">She would not hold out enemy for ever,</div>
                     <div class="line">For giving it to me. Well, peace be with you!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt Portia and Nerissa</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">My Lord Bassanio, let him have the ring:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let his deservings and my love withal</div>
                     <div class="line">Be valued against your wife's commandment.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BASSANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Go, Gratiano, run and overtake him;</div>
                     <div class="line">Give him the ring, and bring him, if thou canst,</div>
                     <div class="line">Unto Antonio's house: away! make haste.</div>
                     <p>Exit Gratiano</p>
                     <div class="line">Come, you and I will thither presently;</div>
                     <div class="line">And in the morning early will we both</div>
                     <div class="line">Fly toward Belmont: come, Antonio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.6.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  The same. A street.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PORTIA and NERISSA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Inquire the Jew's house out, give him this deed</div>
                     <div class="line">And let him sign it: we'll away to-night</div>
                     <div class="line">And be a day before our husbands home:</div>
                     <div class="line">This deed will be well welcome to Lorenzo.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter GRATIANO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Fair sir, you are well o'erta'en</div>
                     <div class="line">My Lord Bassanio upon more advice</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath sent you here this ring, and doth entreat</div>
                     <div class="line">Your company at dinner.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">That cannot be:</div>
                     <div class="line">His ring I do accept most thankfully:</div>
                     <div class="line">And so, I pray you, tell him: furthermore,</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, show my youth old Shylock's house.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">That will I do.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NERISSA</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, I would speak with you.</div>
                     <p>Aside to PORTIA</p>
                     <div class="line">I'll see if I can get my husband's ring,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which I did make him swear to keep for ever.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PORTIA</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to NERISSA</span>  Thou mayst, I warrant.</div>
                     <div class="line">We shall have old swearing</div>
                     <div class="line">That they did give the rings away to men;</div>
                     <div class="line">But we'll outface them, and outswear them too.</div>
                     <p>Aloud</p>
                     <div class="line">Away! make haste: thou knowist where I will tarry.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">NERISSA</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, good sir, will you show me to this house?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.7">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 5. ACT V</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
